comment._content: I think it's great that Fox Talbot was so ahead of his time - "This photo was taken some time in 1843 using a Canon EOS 5D Mark II.". :-) On a more serious note, is that a ships mast and rigging through the window ?

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/chrissamuel] 16 May 1843 = "some time in 1843"? :) Looks like masts and rigging to me too.
